page.title: 07PENGELLI FACH RIDING SCHOOL
page.content: Pengelli Fach Farm is owned by the Thomas family,and is used for numerous things including riding stables,bed and breakfast as well as being a working farm.It's main use is as a riding stables,it has sixteen ponies and provides facilities for both adults and children to learn to ride. Pony trekking is also available from the centre to enable people to see the surrounding countryside at a leisurely pace.The farm building is 300 years old and has many interesting features.The farm house has ample room to allow Mrs Thomas to take in casual visitors for a night or two as they pass through the area.Mrs Thomas tries to participate in village events but often finds she has very little time to do so.Riding lessons last for an hour and cost
